DOC.detailed_description: To describe platelet activity among PAD subject undergo vascular surgery . To determine whether preoperative platelet activity measurement independently associate perioperative cardiovascular event . To identify demographic , clinical , surgical factor associate postoperative platelet activity measurements patient establish PAD .
DOC.criteria: Subjects undergo non emergent vascular surgery Use aspirin within 48 hour prior surgery Age > 21 year age Able willing provide write informed consent study Use anticoagulant ( Coumadin , heparin ) within 24 hour surgery Use Nonsteroidal Antiinflammatory Drug ( NSAID ) ( ibuprofen , naproxen , etc . ) within 72 hour Thrombocytopenia ( platelet count < 100 ) Thrombocytosis ( platelet count > 500 ) , Anemia ( hemoglobin < 9 ) , Severe kidney disease ( CrCl < 30ml/min ) , Any known hemorrhagic diathesis .
